name: Nyctophobia (itch) (Eyron Araza)
description:
Nyctophobia - Fear of darkness.

You are playing as a child who woke up in the middle of the night all alone. Suddenly, you felt thirsty and want to drink water so you have to go to the kitchen. However, you are afraid of the dark.

Music: Nyctophobic (composed by me)

The game is created with Bitsy and the music is created with BeepBox.
